rules_text: Whenever Susan, Temple Maid attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control. Then if you control four or more creatures with +1/+1 counters on them, transform Susan.
rules_text2:
Whenever Susan, Chosen by Vorkezo attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
Creatures you control have ward {X}, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on them.
